name: Mazecube
overview: Mazecube is a puzzle game for the ZX Spectrum. It was developed and published by PAL Software in 1984. Gameplay: Your aim in this game is to eliminate 48 numbers from the paths of a maze. You should also try to finish the maze in as few paces/turns as you can. There are 24 unique mazes, and each are spread around the six faces of a cube.
